description:
The legal repercussions of an accident are overwhelming; half the battle is knowing you won't have to face it alone. At the Atlanta-based personal injury law firm of The Kalka Law Group, we can help you fight for justice after a serious injury or loss of a loved one. Our attorneys have decades of combined experience handling auto accidents, brain injuries, wrongful death cases and more.

Nationally Recognized Trial Lawyers Who Care About Helping Others

In our office, you can feel at home knowing your case matters to us. We're in the personal injury field because we truly care. The millions of dollars we have won for personal injury victims serve as concrete evidence of the dedication we will bring to your case.

Our commitment to placing clients' needs first has resulted in not only victories for clients but also prestigious awards. Our lawyers have been named among Georgia Trend's Legal Elite, the National Trial Lawyers Top 40 under 40 and Georgia Super Lawyers, to name a few. We were also handpicked as Clients' Choice for Personal Injury lawyers on Avvo.

These awards say something: They provide assurance that, at our firm, you will find accomplished legal advocates with proven success and passion.

Learn more about how we can help you make the most of your claim by calling 404-835-8072. The initial consultation is free,and we don't charge fees unless we obtain compensation for you.
